full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer

### Solicitation Number: WS4531198007
#### Tender Closing Date: June 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET
#### Publication Date: May 2, 2024

The Government of Canada, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is inviting qualified suppliers to submit bids for a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) to provide various types of meat, poultry, fish and seafood.

### Products and Services
The RSO seeks to acquire a range of minimally processed meat and poultry products, for use by Correctional Service Canada, the Department of National Defence, and the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.

### Regions of Opportunity
Quebec (except the National Capital Region) is the designated region of delivery.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Procurement Method
The procurement method is competitive, open bidding, with the lowest price being the selection criterion.

### Contact Information
Renee-Ann Therien, Giles Contracting Representative, PSPC/SAPC
Email: [rene-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rene-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information
This tender announcement is posted on the Ariba marketplace platform. Please access the notice URL provided below to obtain additional information and details on the RSO:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19577394?extsite=MTk1NzczOTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
